price: 88. Аллоҳ сизларга ризқ қилиб берган ҳалол, пок нарсалардан енглар ва ўзларингиз иймон келтирган Аллоҳдан қўрқинглар!
arabic: وَكُلُواْ مِمَّا رَزَقَكُمُ ٱللَّهُ حَلَٰلٗا طَيِّبٗاۚ وَٱتَّقُواْ ٱللَّهَ ٱلَّذِيٓ أَنتُم بِهِۦ مُؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: Uzbek translation - Alauddin Mansour
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Uzbek by Alauddin Mansour, printed in 1430 H. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wakulū mimmā razaqakumu al-lahu ḥalālan ṭayyiban wa-ittaqū al-laha alladhī antum bihi mu'minūna
